The third one.

> I've given you everything Riot, my time, my money, some of my grades
> I've given you... my grades

I see you've also deposited your education at the altar of League. I too have paid that tribute.
they should make a "debt" thing... like "you can buy one thing you can't afford, but you'll not be able to: use ip, get gifts, earn first win of the day; till you pay your debt"

I would then be in debt forever.
But it's cool cuz I would get DJ Sona.

o wait.

you can buy but not gift! and if you're in debt you can't receive any gift!
Lol, unfortunenately unlike banks they can't take your home if you don't pay back, so I don't think it's gonna happen.
maybe they could make that till you don't pay your debt you can't earn or use ip... so you'll be unable to do anything but play...
But even that couldn't satisfy your hunger! {{champion:223}}
For those wondering, it's a visual glitch! I get this all the time, so no need to worry! I'm sure OP knows about this too and was just making a silly out of it :p
Yes indeed :D It tends to happen when you buy something that just goes on sale but the system doesn't realize it yet and charges you for the full amount even though you don't have enough RP
Oh King Odarth you silly goose!

damn... now I feel bad that I'm getting all Bs...
If it's any consolation, I think I gave up sleep so I could keep my grades .__.
Funny thing is that I actually don't go to school :p I'm self taught
